channel.title: Server Isn't Working
channel.description: Ok, my friend had set-up everything, everything is checked and correct, but every time I try going on, it won't work, I portfowarded and did everything. Could someone give me some possibilities on what might be wrong. He's using Vista btw and I think you might have to do something for Vista users, but I'm not completely sure, so could someone please help.

item.title: Server Isn't Working
item.dc:creator: @Cyclops72 Cyclops72
item.description:
@Cyclops72 wrote:

Yeah, I did that.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Isn't Working
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Have you ticked the box in the Ip-no conduct, it should be located next to you’re Ip Adress.

Read full topic
